text: Avoding JSP in all in our presentation layer?
We have decided to choose Wicket or Vaadin for our presentation layer.
But i would like to have a question on why do people say JSP is painful?
Today being in the discussion people just flamed at JSP and they were not so ease minded as some were coming with embedding Java code in HTML tags which is painful
I know Wicket and Vaadin does a great job, But does JSP really lacks and needs a lot of improvement.
